email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.25 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market conditions. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. However, can we agree on a demurrage rate of $22,000 per day? Also, can you confirm the laytime start and end dates? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to the demurrage rate of $22,000 per day. The laytime will start on 15 October and end on 20 October. Please confirm if we can proceed with these terms. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the adjustments. We can proceed with the freight rate of $51.25 per metric ton and demurrage at $22,000 per day. Please send over the final contract for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll prepare the contract and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah
